pageProps.description: Trying something new and unexplored is an integral part of the workflow, which we enjoy. If you also want to expand the boundaries with each new project, then you should contact us.

content.text: We love new, interesting, sometimes challenging tasks that help us grow and develop, master new tools and techniques.
We do what we like. That's why we don't take on every project.

benefits.title: advantages
benefits.description: What, in addition to loving what we do, allows us to achieve great results for each project:

list.title: Help and support
list.text: The opportunity to address any question to a senior or any other colleague, and even to the head of the studio.

list.title: Recognition
list.text: You will work on projects that will take part in Russian and international competitions, and you will be able to add them to your portfolio.

list.title: A clear grading system
list.text:
How to grow in salary and skills is written
in a special document for each specialty — from an intern to a senior.

list.title: growth environment
list.text: Weekly "screenings" of projects, English classes, feedback from colleagues, interesting tasks — it is simply impossible not to grow in such conditions.

list.title: Corporate events
list.text:
Yes. We like to get together at least 3 times a year
and have a good time somewhere outside the city.
And we even sometimes pay for the road with a remote employee.

jobs.title: Looking for talent
jobs.text: It's not a fact that we have current vacancies, but we are always on the lookout for talent. We get to know each other, communicate, replenish the database of applicants. We will be glad to meet you too!

events.title: events
events.text:
We love to hold all kinds of parties in our favorite city and beyond.
For more than 15 years of work, we've held at least 7 events and we don't plan to stop yet

events.title: Chipec
events.text: one of the largest digital conferences in the country

events.title: Behance Portfolio Reviews
events.text: event for designers and people with creative inclinations
